history.string: add policy IMS_DCDecision
mod policy IMS_DCDecision description 'Default Policy for Decision objects'
mod policy IMS_DCDecision add type IMS_DCDecision
mod policy IMS_DCDecision sequence 1,2,3,...
mod policy IMS_DCDecision add allstate public none none owner none none

mod policy IMS_DCDecision allstate revoke public none none filter '' remove revoke public all all revoke owner none none filter '' remove revoke owner all all public none none filter '' remove public all all owner none none filter '' remove owner all all
mod policy IMS_DCDecision allstate user 'Global User' key SecuredGlobalUser read read,show,toconnect,todisconnect ancestor organization ancestor project
mod policy IMS_DCDecision allstate user IMS_AP_Designer all all
mod policy IMS_DCDecision allstate user VPLMLocalCrossOrgContextAccess key ExtendedOwnerReadAccess checkout checkout,read,show,toconnect,todisconnect context owner
mod policy IMS_DCDecision allstate login user VPLMAdmin key ExtendedModifyAccessForPLMAdmin changename changename,checkin,modify
mod policy IMS_DCDecision allstate login user VPLMAdmin key ExtendedPromoteAccessForPLMAdmin demote demote,promote
mod policy IMS_DCDecision allstate login user VPLMAdmin key ExtendedReadAccessForPLMAdmin checkout checkout,read,show,toconnect,todisconnect
mod policy IMS_DCDecision add state Active public none none owner none none
mod policy IMS_DCDecision add state Superceded public none none owner none none
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Superceded !enforcereserveaccess
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Superceded promote false
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Superceded checkoutHistory false
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Superceded version false
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Superceded action '' input ''
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Superceded check '' input ''
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Superceded majorrevision true
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Superceded minorrevision true
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Superceded published false
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Superceded owner create create,delete,read,revise,show,toconnect
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Superceded public read read
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Superceded public key ExtendedPublicReadAccess read read,show,toconnect,todisconnect ancestor organization public maturity filter expression[OrganizationPublicAccess]
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Superceded user Employee read read,show,toconnect,todisconnect
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Superceded user 'Exchange User' toconnect toconnect
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Superceded user 'Global User' key owner delete delete,read,revise,show,toconnect single organization single project context owner
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Superceded user Grant key grant_key all all single project
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Superceded user VPLMLocalCrossOrgContextAccess key ExtendedContextualPrivateReadAccess checkout checkout,read,show,toconnect,todisconnect single project

mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Superceded user VPLMLocalCrossPrjContextAccess key ExtendedPublicReadAccess checkout checkout,read,show,toconnect,todisconnect ancestor organization notprivate maturity filter expression[OrganizationPublicAccess]

mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Superceded user VPLMSecuredCrossAccess key ExtendedReadAccessForPublicGuest checkout checkout,read,show,toconnect,todisconnect single organization single project notprivate maturity
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Superceded login user VPLMAdmin key ExtendedCreateAccessForPLMAdmin delete delete,revise
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Superceded login user VPLMExperimenter key ExtendedCreateAccessForPrivateAuthoring delete delete,revise single organization single project context owner
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Superceded login user VPLMProjectLeader key ExtendedCreateAccessForTechnicalLeader delete delete,revise single organization single project
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active !enforcereserveaccess
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active promote true
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active checkoutHistory false
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active version false
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active action '' input ''
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active check '' input ''
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active majorrevision true
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active minorrevision true
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active published false

mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active owner changename changename,changeowner,changepolicy,changetype,changevault,create,delete,disable,enable,fromconnect,fromdisconnect,grant,modify,promote,read,revoke,show,toconnect,todisconnect
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active public key ExtendedPublicReadAccess read read,show,toconnect,todisconnect ancestor organization public maturity filter expression[OrganizationPublicAccess]
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active user 'Access Grantor' checkin checkin,checkout,delete,fromconnect,fromdisconnect,grant,lock,modify,read,revise,revoke,show,toconnect,todisconnect,unlock
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active user Employee fromconnect fromconnect,fromdisconnect,read,show,toconnect,todisconnect

mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active user 'Global User' key owner changename changename,changeowner,changepolicy,changetype,changevault,create,delete,disable,enable,fromconnect,fromdisconnect,grant,modify,promote,read,revoke,show,toconnect,todisconnect single organization single project context owner
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active user Grant key grant_key all all single project

mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active user VPLMAdmin changename changename,changeowner,changepolicy,changetype,changevault,create,delete,fromconnect,fromdisconnect,modify,promote,read,revise,schedule,show,toconnect,todisconnect single organization single project
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active user VPLMCreator create create,delete,fromconnect,fromdisconnect,modify,read,revise,show,toconnect,todisconnect single organization single project
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active user VPLMLocalCrossOrgContextAccess key ExtendedContextualPrivateReadAccess checkout checkout,read,show,toconnect,todisconnect single project

mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active user VPLMLocalCrossPrjContextAccess key ExtendedPublicReadAccess checkout checkout,read,show,toconnect,todisconnect ancestor organization public maturity filter expression[OrganizationPublicAccess]
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active user VPLMProjectLeader create create,delete,fromconnect,fromdisconnect,modify,read,revise,show,toconnect,todisconnect single organization single project

mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active user VPLMSecuredCrossAccess key ExtendedReadAccessForPublicGuest checkout checkout,read,show,toconnect,todisconnect single organization single project public maturity
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active user VPLMViewer read read,show single organization single project
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active login owner key VPLMStrictOrgOwnershipIsFALSE demote demote,promote single project filter (!expression[VPLMStrictOrgOwnership])
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active login owner key VPLMStrictOrgOwnershipIsTRUE demote demote,promote single organization single project
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active login user VPLMAdmin key ExtendedCreateAccessForPLMAdmin create create,delete,revise
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active login user VPLMExperimenter key ExtendedCreateAccessForPrivateAuthoring create create,delete,revise single organization single project context owner

mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active login user VPLMExperimenter key VPLMStrictOrgOwnershipIsFALSE1 changename changename,checkin,modify single project filter '(!expression[VPLMStrictOwnership_Evaluation]) && (!expression[VPLMStrictOrgOwnership])'

mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active login user VPLMExperimenter key VPLMStrictOrgOwnershipIsFALSE2 changename changename,checkin,modify single project context owner filter (!expression[VPLMStrictOrgOwnership])

mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active login user VPLMExperimenter key VPLMStrictOrgOwnershipIsTRUE1 changename changename,checkin,modify single organization single project filter (!expression[VPLMStrictOwnership_Evaluation])
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active login user VPLMExperimenter key VPLMStrictOrgOwnershipIsTRUE2 changename changename,checkin,modify single organization single project context owner
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active login user VPLMProjectAdministrator key ExtendedModifyAccessForPrjAdmin changename changename,checkin,modify single project
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active login user VPLMProjectLeader key ExtendedCreateAccessForTechnicalLeader create create,delete,revise single organization single project

mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active login user VPLMProjectLeader key VPLMStrictOrgOwnershipIsFALSE changename changename,checkin,demote,modify,promote single project filter (!expression[VPLMStrictOrgOwnership])
mod policy IMS_DCDecision state Active login user VPLMProjectLeader key VPLMStrictOrgOwnershipIsTRUE changename changename,checkin,demote,modify,promote single organization single project
mod policy IMS_DCDecision add property state_Superceded value Superceded
mod policy IMS_DCDecision add property state_Active value Active
mod policy IMS_DCDecision add property 'MxUpdate Sub Path'
mod policy IMS_DCDecision add property application value IMS_HNH
mod policy IMS_DCDecision add property 'file date' value '04-24-2019 14:19:54.000'
mod policy IMS_DCDecision add property 'installed date' value 07-10-2019
mod policy IMS_DCDecision add property installer value 'The MxUpdate Team'
mod policy IMS_DCDecision add property 'original name' value IMS_DCDecision
mod policy IMS_DCDecision add property state_Release value Release
mod policy IMS_DCDecision add property version value 1
